alert.note: Alert for Northern Marinette County; Northern Oconto County; Southern Marinette County (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GreenBay (East Central Wisconsin - Green Bay)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 16 at 5:02PM CDT by NWS GreenBay
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of central Marinette and northern Oconto Counties through 545 PM CDT... At 501 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 8 miles east of Pembine to 6 miles northeast of Wausaukee to near Crivitz to near Mountain. Movement was east at 45 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Crivitz, Wausaukee, Townsend, Middle Inlet, Lakewood, Amberg, Athelstane, Boot Lake Campground, Mcallister and Governor Thompson State Park. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Northern Marinette County; Northern Oconto County; Southern Marinette County
